General.Name: Arad Investment & Industrial Development Ltd
General.Description: Arad Investment & Industrial Development Ltd., through its subsidiaries, operates in the real estate, technology, software, outsourcing, human resources, and other sectors. The company engages in planning, construction, and management of industrial and storage buildings, parks for knowledge-intensive industries, and commercial centers; sale of apartments; improvement and sale of land owned for residential buildings; and development of various construction projects. It also offers computer system consulting, planning, implementation, integration, training, and maintenance services; support and other professional services for computing systems; data processing and communication services; software development services; and computers, peripherals, infrastructure software, storage products, mainframes, and communications products. In addition, the company provides outsourcing services; maintenance services for communication systems; and payroll, human resource, and long-term saving services. Further, it sells communications equipment. Arad Investment & Industrial Development Ltd. was incorporated in 1963 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
